posts.title: The debate is AGING WELL for Trump
posts.content:
1. Trump won the debate on substance.

2. Even if you ignore the rigging and assume it was a fair debate, Trump came out ok on optics.

The debate was a perfect symbol for the modern state of America: a diversity hire screwing an older white man by rigging the game and pretending to have succeeded on merit.

But that’s not the story Democrats are telling. Democrats are running a psyop that is based on a half truth

Trump was triggered by Harris and performed poorly at the debate due to his ego. He lost focus.

What’s true:

  • Trump was angry
  • Trump’s performance was par for the course
  • Harris’s performance was exceptional by her low standards

What’s false:

  • Trump was not triggered by Harris. This is false. He had righteous indignation at what she’s done to our country.
  • Trump was not “unfocused” he just simply couldn’t get on the subjects he wanted to discuss without being interrupted by the mods

Trump’ made mistakes, but he had a performance that was solid. It’s just not as impressive to see Michael Jordan dunking for the 1000th time. It’s more impressive to see a midget like Kamala doing it, even if she’s jumping off a trampoline and cheating.

We are used to Trump’s brilliance. We are all expecting Kamala to be a Biden-tier retard. When she comes out on the stage with a million dollars worth of make up on and repeats a few MSNBC lines, we all say to ourselves holy shit! She’s not totally retarded! I cannot believe it! She didn’t actually shit her pants on live TV like Brandon!

Congratulations bitch. You proved you’re not literally retarded. You can read. According to all your pollster friends, you totally “won” the debate.

But why don’t we take a step back… Why are we even discussing Trump’s “performance” in what we know was a rigged game? If the Patriots won the Super Bowl, and it was proved they rigged the game, we wouldn’t be talking about how the other team should have just “performed” better.

You cannot blame Trump for the Media being evil. He handled the situation brilliantly when you think about all he was up against. His performance was objectively great even if you think Kamala “won” the rigged debate. She didn’t win though, and while we all thought we needed a knockout punch, a stalemate for Trump was actually the best we could realistically hope for.

Trump didn’t have the option of not debating Kamala at all. This would have made him look weak and let the MSM define Kamala entirely. Kamala “won” the debate in the sense that she was the winner of a show trial. She didn’t make any significant gains with the people who will decide this election. She just energized a bunch of fags from NY and California who tweet a lot.

Trump only looks bad to people impressed by razzle dazzle, which is usually the area that Trump wins the most. It is weird for us to see Trump being outdone on a theatrical level. He’s usually the most theatrical one himself

But he didn’t need it this time. He needed substance for swing voters. Harris had no substance and only truly appealed to Democrats. Independents in swing states may have thought she “won” the debate, but they’re still more likely to vote Trump because of the policies he made clear to them.

Trump dropped the razzle dazzle and took an old school approach to the debate and got his message across (albeit imperfectly) to the people who will decide the election. He was especially strong on abortion topic. He defended himself well even if he couldn’t land a knockout punch on her early on like everyone wanted.

The debate aged well already for him and will continue aging well. Rewatch it now if you don’t believe me.
posts.raw_content:
**1. Trump won the debate on substance.**

**2. Even if you ignore the rigging and assume it was a fair debate, Trump came out ok on optics.**

The debate was a perfect symbol for the modern state of America: a diversity hire screwing an older white man by rigging the game and pretending to have succeeded on merit.

But that’s not the story Democrats are telling. Democrats are running a psyop that is based on a half truth

> Trump was triggered by Harris and performed poorly at the debate due to his ego. He lost focus.

What’s true:
 - Trump was angry
- Trump’s performance was par for the course 
- Harris’s performance was exceptional by her low standards 

What’s false:
- Trump was not triggered by Harris. This is false. He had righteous indignation at what she’s done to our country.
- Trump was not “unfocused” he just simply couldn’t get on the subjects he wanted to discuss without being interrupted by the mods

Trump’ made mistakes, but he had a performance that was solid. It’s just not as impressive to see Michael Jordan dunking for the 1000th time. It’s more impressive to see a midget like Kamala doing it, even if she’s jumping off a trampoline and cheating. 

We are used to Trump’s brilliance. We are all expecting Kamala to be a Biden-tier retard. When she comes out on the stage with a million dollars worth of make up on and repeats a few MSNBC lines, we all say to ourselves *holy shit! She’s not totally retarded! I cannot believe it! She didn’t actually shit her pants on live TV like Brandon!*

Congratulations bitch. You proved you’re not literally retarded. You can read. According to all your pollster friends, you totally “won” the debate. 

But why don’t we take a step back… Why are we even discussing Trump’s “performance” in what we know was a rigged game? If the Patriots won the Super Bowl, and it was proved they rigged the game, we wouldn’t be talking about how the other team should have just “performed” better.

You cannot blame Trump for the Media being evil. He handled the situation brilliantly when you think about all he was up against. His performance was objectively great even if you think Kamala “won” the rigged debate. She didn’t win though, and while we all thought we needed a knockout punch, a stalemate for Trump was actually the best we could realistically hope for.

Trump didn’t have the option of not debating Kamala at all. This would have made him look weak and let the MSM define Kamala entirely.
Kamala “won” the debate in the sense that she was the winner of a show trial. She didn’t make any significant gains with the people who will decide this election. She just energized a bunch of fags from NY and California who tweet a lot.

Trump only looks bad to people impressed by razzle dazzle, which is usually the area that Trump wins the most. It is weird for us to see Trump being outdone on a theatrical level. He’s usually the most theatrical one himself

Trump dropped the razzle dazzle and took an old school approach to the debate and got his message across (albeit imperfectly) to the people who will decide the election. He was especially strong on abortion topic. He defended himself well even if he couldn’t land a knockout punch on her early on like everyone wanted. 

The debate aged well already for him and will continue aging well. Rewatch it now if you don’t believe me.
